name: Here They Are
description:
They are here!!!

Only you stand in fonrt of the invading force, stand your ground and survive as long as you can

Press "Enter" to start

Use A and D to move 

Use Left Arrow and Right Arrow to move

Press Space to Shoot

Press "R" to re-try

Music from  8 bit Booster

Sound From 8 bit sfx library

Art From Pixel Spaceships-shoot'em ups pack
